name: Senior Program Manager (K09542)
description:
The Federal Police wants to replace and renew several legacy applications and databases, according to the actual technology standards.  These applications support the operational processes of the police; a seamless transition is crucial to guarantee operational business continuity.

 
The PM standardizes the program-related governance processes and facilitates the sharing of resources, budget, methodologies, tools, and techniques.

Responsibilities of the PM include:

  • Strategic Alignment : Contribute to the execution of the digital transformation vision and strategy.  Align the program with the GPI digital strategy and ensuring the program contributes tot the organisation objectives and priorities
  • Program Coordination : manage the dependencies and relations among the projects in the program.  
    Challenging and reviewing the deliverables of the projects delivered by the integrator (f.i. scope, deliverables, resources, scheduling & planning of “project fiches”, “SOW”)
  • Progress and Delivery Management : monitor and report the progress of projects and the deliveries, follow up of milestones and planning
  • Contract Management of the integrator: follow up and negotiate on contract execution. Documenting contract execution, negotiate end of program hand-over and contract closure.  Consult and collaborate with procurement and legal expertise
  • Stakeholder Management : manage the relations with stakeholders, regular updates and communication on program execution and contractual aspects
  • Budget Management : coordinate with the Financial Manager and PMO the overall budget – allocation (purchase orders), spending (invoicing) and forecast
